faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services, processes, and how we can help your brand grow.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Get in touch with our team and we'll be happy to help you.

q1.question: How does Tikit Agency work?
q1.answer: Our process is simple and effective: First, we dive deep into understanding your brand goals and target audience. Then, our strategy team develops a customized campaign plan. Next, we match you with the right creators or create compelling content. Finally, we execute the campaign and provide real-time analytics and reporting. Throughout the process, you'll have a dedicated account manager ensuring everything runs smoothly.

q2.question: What is your production process?
q2.answer: Our production workflow has four phases: 1) Pre-Production - concept development, scriptwriting, location scouting, and planning. 2) Production - professional filming with cinema cameras, drones, and state-of-the-art equipment. 3) Post-Production - expert editing, color grading, motion graphics, and sound design. 4) Delivery - optimized content in all required formats for your platforms. We handle everything from social media reels to full-scale commercial productions.

q3.question: Who is on the Tikit team?
q3.answer: Our team consists of 50+ creative professionals including: strategists who plan data-driven campaigns, content creators and videographers who bring ideas to life, social media managers who engage audiences, designers who craft visual identities, and account managers who ensure client satisfaction. We also have specialists in influencer relations, analytics, and paid advertising across the MENA region.

q4.question: Where are Tikit's offices located?
q4.answer: Tikit Agency has a strategic presence across the MENA region. Our headquarters is in Dubai at The Burlington Tower, Marasi Drive, Office 309. We also have dedicated offices in Saudi Arabia (serving Riyadh and Jeddah), Istanbul (Turkey), and Syria. This regional presence allows us to understand local markets and deliver culturally relevant campaigns across the GCC and broader MENA region.

q5.question: How long does a typical campaign take?
q5.answer: Campaign timelines vary based on scope and objectives. A quick influencer activation can launch in 1-2 weeks, while comprehensive brand campaigns typically take 4-8 weeks from strategy to execution. Full-scale production projects may require 6-12 weeks. During our initial consultation, we'll provide a detailed timeline tailored to your specific project and goals.

q6.question: What platforms do you specialize in?
q6.answer: We manage campaigns across all major social media platforms including Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Snapchat, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, and Facebook. We're particularly strong in platforms popular in the MENA region like Instagram and Snapchat. Our team stays updated with platform algorithms, trending formats, and best practices to maximize your content's reach and engagement.

q7.question: Do you work with international brands?
q7.answer: Absolutely! While we're based in the MENA region, we work with both local and international brands. Our multilingual team (English, Arabic, French, Turkish) and cultural expertise help global brands enter and succeed in Middle Eastern markets. We've successfully launched campaigns for brands from Europe, Asia, and North America looking to establish presence in the GCC region.

q8.question: What is your pricing structure?
q8.answer: Our pricing is customized based on project scope, deliverables, and campaign duration. We offer flexible packages ranging from one-time projects to ongoing retainer agreements. Influencer marketing campaigns start based on the creator tier and engagement goals. Production services are quoted per project based on complexity. Contact us for a detailed proposal tailored to your budget and objectives.

q9.question: How do you measure campaign success?
q9.answer: We track comprehensive metrics aligned with your goals: reach and impressions, engagement rates (likes, comments, shares), website traffic and conversions, follower growth, brand sentiment analysis, and ROI. You'll receive detailed analytics reports showing campaign performance, audience insights, and recommendations for optimization. We believe in transparency and data-driven results.

q10.question: Can you help with both organic and paid campaigns?
q10.answer: Yes! We offer both organic content strategy and paid advertising services. Our organic approach focuses on authentic engagement, community building, and content that resonates. For paid campaigns, we manage social media ads across Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat, and LinkedIn with precise targeting and budget optimization. Most clients benefit from a hybrid approach combining both strategies for maximum impact.

header.title: Project Deep Dive
header.description: Browse categories on the left and explore each section within the selected area on the right.

sidebar.title: Sections
sidebar.description: Navigate through each phase of our campaign methodology.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Define clear goals and measurable outcomes that drive the entire campaign strategy forward.

brief.title: Brief
brief.description: Comprehensive overview of the project scope, requirements, and creative direction.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: Detailed execution plan mapping out channels, timeline, and resource allocation.

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: Creative methodology and tactical implementation showcasing our unique process.

objective.title: Campaign Objective
objective.body:
Our primary objective was to establish a powerful brand presence across multiple digital touchpoints while driving measurable engagement and conversion metrics. We focused on creating authentic connections with the target audience through strategic influencer partnerships and compelling content narratives.

The campaign aimed to achieve a 40% increase in brand awareness within the target demographic, generate over 2 million organic impressions, and establish long-term relationships with key industry influencers. By leveraging data-driven insights and creative storytelling, we positioned the brand as an industry leader in innovation and customer-centric values.

Secondary objectives included building a sustainable content ecosystem, fostering community engagement, and creating shareable moments that would extend the campaign's reach organically beyond paid media investments.

brief.title: Project Brief
brief.body:
The client approached us with a clear vision: transform their digital presence and connect with a younger, more engaged audience segment. The brief outlined specific requirements for influencer selection, content themes, and brand messaging consistency across all touchpoints.

Key deliverables included a comprehensive influencer partnership program spanning 12 weeks, creation of 50+ pieces of original content across Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube, and development of a brand ambassador program for sustained engagement.

The brief emphasized authenticity as the cornerstone of all content creation, ensuring that influencer partnerships felt genuine and aligned with both the brand's values and the creator's personal style. Budget allocation prioritized quality over quantity, with focus on micro-influencers who demonstrated high engagement rates within niche communities.

strategy.title: Strategic Framework
strategy.body:
Our strategy centered on a three-phase approach: Discovery, Activation, and Amplification. Each phase built upon the previous, creating a cohesive narrative arc that kept audiences engaged throughout the campaign duration.

Phase One focused on identifying and vetting potential influencer partners, conducting audience analysis, and establishing content guidelines. We utilized proprietary tools to assess creator authenticity scores and audience overlap potential.

Phase Two involved coordinated content rollout across platforms, with carefully timed posts designed to maximize algorithmic visibility. Real-time monitoring allowed for agile adjustments to content strategy based on performance metrics.

Phase Three amplified top-performing content through paid media support and cross-platform repurposing, extending reach while maintaining cost efficiency. Community management protocols ensured consistent brand voice in all audience interactions.

approach.title: Creative Approach
approach.body:
Our creative approach prioritized authentic storytelling over traditional advertising formats. Each piece of content was developed collaboratively with influencer partners, ensuring their unique voice remained central while effectively communicating brand messages.

The visual identity maintained consistency through subtle brand integration techniques that felt native to each platform's aesthetic expectations. We developed platform-specific content variations that respected the unique culture and consumption patterns of each channel's user base.
